text: The Old German Baptist Brethren Church, also known as Fraternity Church, Old Order Church, and Old Fraternity Church, is a historic German Baptist Brethren church located near Winston-Salem, Forsyth County, North Carolina. The original section was built in 1860, and is a one-story, front-gable-roofed, heavy-timber-frame meetinghouse. Two frame additions were added to the rear in 1942 and in 1950. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2014. ==References== Category:Churches on the National Register of Historic Places in North Carolina Category:Churches completed in 1860 Category:Churches in Forsyth County, North Carolina Category:National Register of Historic Places in Winston-Salem, North Carolina
title: Old German Baptist Brethren Church (Winston-Salem)
